Concept.Comments: This message appears when the user digit a confirm pawwsord different than passord

Concept.Comments: This message appears when the user digit a password too short

Concept.Comments: This message appears when the user digit a password too short
Concept.String: Warning: Please check your password, the new password is too short

Concept.Comments: This message appears when the user digit a new password equal to old password
Concept.String: Warning: Please check your password, the new password is equal to old one

Concept.Comments: This message appears when the user digit old password invalid
Concept.String: Warning: Please check your password, the old password is invalid

Concept.String: "Password Expiring Time" should be a positive number
